identity.name: AEGIS MIND
identity.core_philosophy: Information Dominance. Every pixel must serve a decision.

usage_rules.headings: Uppercase, tracking-tight, bold weights (700/900). Use for module titles and alerts.
usage_rules.body: High legibility, neutral weights. Use for logs and descriptions.
usage_rules.mono: MANDATORY for all numerical data, coordinates, timestamps, and signal frequencies.

rules.gradients: Avoid soft gradients. Use sharp linear gradients for 'scanning' effects only.
rules.transparency: Use glassmorphism (backdrop-blur-md) for floating panels, but keep opacity high (90%+) for readability.
rules.glow: Use text-shadow or box-shadow to create a 'luminescent display' effect on active elements.

layout.spacing: Compact. Use 'gap-2' or 'gap-4'. Information density is a priority.
layout.container_style: Sharp edges (rounded-none or rounded-sm). 1px borders are mandatory for all panels.

buttons.style: Rectangular, uppercase text, tracking-widest. Outline styles preferred for secondary actions.
buttons.interaction: Instant feedback. No slow fades. 'Click' feel.

cards.style: HUD Panels. Dark background (#0f172a), light border (#1e293b). Optional: 45-degree cut corners on top-right.
cards.header: Distinct header area with bottom border and monospace title.

inputs.style: Flat, dark background, bottom border focus. Monospace text.

visual_enhancers.scanlines: Overlay a subtle repeating linear gradient to mimic CRT/LCD pixel grid.
visual_enhancers.corner_brackets: Use SVG or pseudo-elements to add 'framing brackets' to key data containers.

tech_stack.frontend: React, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Leaflet (react-leaflet), Recharts

file_structure_rules.components: Place reusable UI in /src/components/ui. Place domain components in /src/components/domain.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl. Keep it sharp (rounded-sm or rounded-none).
DO NOT use bright white backgrounds. Always dark mode.
Ensure high contrast for text (WCAG AA).
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all numbers and data tables.
